1: Create one rare costume at the costume shop.
2: Raise a member's Skill Level once.
3: Raise a member's Master Rank once.
4: Create one another-color costume at the costume shop.
5: Raise one character's Character Rank to Rank 3.
6: Set three titles to your profile.
7: Select an Another Vocal and complete one live.
9: View someone's self-introduction in the Character Profiles.
10: Read a member's [Part 1] card story once.
11: Read a member's [Part 2] card story once.
13: Buy a virtual live avatar costume once.
